articles.title: New Year Address Encouraging All People in DPRK
articles.content:
New Year Address Encouraging All People in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for Juche 106 (2017) said that he felt a surge of anxiety about what he should do to hold his people in greater reverence, the best people in the world.
					 Ri Ui Gu, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 I was deeply moved to see that the respected Supreme Leader swore to become a true servant loyal to his people who faithfully supports them with a pure conscience and work with devotion to ensure that the past era in which all the people used to sing the song "We Are the Happiest in the World", feeling optimistic about the future with confidence in the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, does not remain as a moment in history but is re-presented in the present era.
					
					 Receiving the New Year Address, all the people of the country are filled with gratitude to Kim Jong Un and confidence in the final victory as they are convinced that what he intends and wishes will be sure to be materialized.
					
					 Jo Ju Yong, manager of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said:
					
					 Upon receiving the historic New Year Address, we are full of deep emotion.
					
					 In the New Year Address, the respected Supreme Leader said that in this significant year, by further encouraging the revolutionary spirit that was heightened to an incomparable degree in the course of the previous miraculous year, we should make remarkable progress in the implementation of the decisions adopted at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus translate the people's ideals and dreams into brilliant reality on this land.
					
					 All the workers of the complex are firmly determined to concentrate their efforts on implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, upholding the slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Year of 2016
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Year of 2016
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The last year was a year to be specially recorded in history as the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 It was also a year of historic significance when all the people started a grand general advance towards the final victory of the revolution in hearty response to the programme set forth by the Congress, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Last year a new milestone was laid in the struggle to further strengthen the Party and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 In May last year the 7th WPK Congress was held significantly amid the revolutionary enthusiasm of all the party members, service personnel and other people throughout the country and the great interest of the world.
					
					 The Conference of Chairpersons of the Party Primary Committees held last year for the first time in the history of the WPK was a meeting of significance and glory as it paved a shortcut to developing the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 The congresses of the youth league and the women's union, the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea held in succession in wake of the 7th WPK Congress marked an epoch-making milestone in further consolidating the working people's organizations, the transmission belts of the Party, and enhancing their militant role as required by the developing revolution in which the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is pushed ahead in all spheres.
					
					 Last year saw a radical turn in bolstering up the defence capabilities of Juche Korea and a turning phase brought about on all fronts for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 All the brilliant successes made by the DPRK in all fields of the revolution and construction are by no means attributable to any good conditions, nor are they a fortuitous result of any divine power.
					
					 It is thanks to the experienced and tested guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un that the year of 2016 was recorded as a year of great turn in the development of the Party and the revolution and the struggle and life of the people.
					
					 The mysterious power that brought out the epoch-making miracles and victories in the worst adversity is the result of the single-minded unity and the great self-development capability of the army and people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Invariable Tenet of Foreign Policy of WPK and DPRK Government
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Invariable Tenet of Foreign Policy of WPK and DPRK Government
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to expand and develop the relations of good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation with those countries championing independence and struggle to ensure genuine international justice, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Tuesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government have waged a vigorous struggle to accomplish the human cause of independence, consistently adhering to an independent stand in their external activities.
					
					 Had we failed to abide by the principle of independence in the external relations and yielded to the pressure of the imperialists and the big-power chauvinists, we would not have been able to build a socialist country -- independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, and the country would have been reduced to a satellite country of big powers or colonial slave of the imperialists to go to ruin.
					
					 We dealt with all issues arising in the international arena with independence as a yardstick and waged a principled and uncompromising struggle against the practices of encroaching upon the sovereignty of other countries.
					
					 We remain unchanged in our will to ensure peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world. Peace is dear for us but we never beg for it. If aggressors and provocateurs provoke us even a bit, we will not allow them even in the least but mercilessly wipe them out and thus achieve lasting peace. This is the firm faith and will of the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has so far positively developed the relations of good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation with the progressive countries of the world which respect its sovereignty and are friendly towards it.
					
					 Its stance will remain unchanged forever.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to improve and normalize the ties with those countries which recognize its sovereignty and are friendly to it, breaking with their past boldly, though they had been in the hostile relationship with it in the past.

articles.title: Sex Offences on Increase among S. Korean Diplomats
articles.content:
Sex Offences on Increase among S. Korean Diplomats
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that on Dec. 30 last year a secretary of the puppet foreign ministry of south Korea committed sexual offenses to spark social uproar, according to south Korean KBS.
					 He committed a sexual offense with his cell phone in a restaurant of Seoul.
					
					 He had perpetrated similar crimes against women on buses.
					
					 A south Korean diplomat working in Chile committed a sexual abuse against a girl in her minority and a puppet ambassador of the embassy of south Korea in a Middle East country molested a female staff member.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Blast Reckless Remarks of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Blast Reckless Remarks of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea bitterly condemned Park Geun Hye for making a fool of the people at a so-called meet-the press on the New Year, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 A spokesman for the Minju Party said that it is unreasonable for the "president" whose performance of duty is suspended after the passage of the motion on impeachment of her through the "National Assembly" to have such event. 
					
					 The floor leader of the above-said party slammed her outbursts full of sophism and rubbish. 
					
					 A spokesman of the Kukmin Party denounced Park for her shameless utterances that she "did her best" over the ferry "Sewol" disaster.
					
					 A spokesman for the Jongui Party termed her remarks cowardly fit of the accused "president."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 23 last year to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership.
					 The work is a speech the Supreme Leader delivered at the military parade held on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It clarifies that the century-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Sweden
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" was brought out in pamphlet by the Stockholm Vallingby Publishing House of Sweden on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership and the 99th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The work, published on February 26, Juche 104 (2015), indicates the tasks and ways for covering the mountains of the country with green woods by conducting a vigorous forest restoration campaign involving the entire party, the whole army and all the people.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Stockholm on Dec. 22 last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Bodies
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders, is another commander of Mt. Paektu with iron will and superb strategy.
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 meeting for praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on December 19 last year.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK held respected HE Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army on Dec. 30, 2011.
					
					 He inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA, associated with the Songun revolutionary leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, on the occasion of the new year 2012.
					
					 Under his guidance the DPRK had access to the nuclear deterrent strong enough to meet the challenge of the U.S. imperialist war maniacs and the KPA has emerged the strongest revolutionary forces.
					
					 We warmly congratulate the Korean people on the 5th anniversary of his assumption of KPA supreme commandership.
					
					 Long live Marshal Kim Jong Un, another commander of Mt. Paektu and peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun!

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a presidente turco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a presidente turco
Pyongyang, 3 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam envio el dia 2 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de Turquia, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas por el ataque terrorista en ese pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso la profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario y los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Reafirmando la posicion de principios de la RPDC contra todo tipo de terrorismo, formulo votos por exitos en los trabajos del presidente y el gobierno de Turquia destinados a prevenir el terrorismo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun reafirma el ideal de politica exterior de PTC y RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun reafirma el ideal de politica exterior de PTC y RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun aclara que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mantienen la invariable posicion de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con los paises que defienden la independencia y luchar por realizar la verdadera justicia internacional, y prosigue:
					Nuestro partido y el gobierno de la RPDC vinieron luchando de modo activo por la causa de la independencia de la humanidad manteniendo invariablemente la posicion independiente en sus actividades exteriores.
					
					Si la RPDC hubiera renunciado el principio de independencia en las relaciones exteriores y doblegado ante la represion de los imperialistas y los chovinistas de gran potencia, no habria levantado un Estado socialista de caracter independiente, autarquico y autodefensivo, convirtiendo en un pais satelite de otras potencias y la colonia de los imperialistas.
					
					Hemos tratado todos los problemas internacionales tras evaluarlos tomando como la pauta la independencia. Y tambien hemos luchado de manera intransigente y de principios los actos violadores a la soberania de otros paises.
					
					Jamas se cambiara la voluntad de la RPDC de asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo. Apreciamos la paz, pero no la mendigamos nunca. Si los agresores y provocadores nos atentan aunque sea minimo, les exterminaremos sin piedad para traer la paz duradera y eterna. Esto es la indestructible conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos.
					
					Hasta la fecha, la RPDC vino desarrollando activamente las relaciones de buena vecindad y de amistad y cooperacion con los paises progresistas del mundo que respetan la soberania de la primera y la tratan amistosamente.
					
					La posicion de la RPDC sera invariable.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, mejoraremos y normalizaremos las relaciones con los paises que respeten nuestra soberania y nos traten amistosamente, aunque tenian relaciones hostiles en el pasado.

articles.title: Partidos opositores surcoreanos condenan disparates de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Partidos opositores surcoreanos condenan disparates de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 3 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun la agencia surcoreana Yonhap News, los partidos opositores denunciaron severamente a la traidora Park Geun-hye que burlo a los habitantes en una entrevista con la prensa organizada el dia primero.
					El portavoz del Partido Minju insistio en que es una cosa ilogica el hecho de que la "presidenta", en suspension de su cargo por la dimision, realizo una reunion con los periodistas.
					
					Condeno a Park que al ser dimitida por los habitantes y la "Asamblea Nacional" sigue actuar como "presidenta".
					
					El portavoz parlamentario del Partido Minju expreso su indignacion diciendo que Park Geun-hye intenta librar una guerra contra los habitantes desde los principios del ano nuevo soltando unas sofisterias y unas locuras.
					
					El vocero del Partido Kukmin califico de lo imperdonable y de acto verbal cinico la expresion de la posicion de Park que subrayo que "hizo todo lo posible" en relacion con la tragedia del caso de Ferry "Sewol".
					
					El portavoz del Partido Jongwui calumnio las presentes palabras de Park como los ultimos esfuerzos de la "mandataria" que intenta negar sus errores.
